title: Wirksworth
name: Carsington Water
content: For a great family day out: reservoir, activities include: walking, cycling, fly fishing, birdwatching, sailing, canoeing, and windsurfing.  . In addition to water sports and a sailing club, there are walking and cycle routes around the reservoir. Cycle hire is available and you can also get refreshments there.[http://www.carsingtonwater.com/ Carsington Water]
